thread.title: Football Lands 20 on Academic All-MAC Team
thread.title_full: Football Lands 20 on Academic All-MAC Team

author: @@WMU_Football
title: Football Lands 20 on Academic All-MAC Team
text: Football January 16, 2025 Football Lands 20 on Academic All-MAC Team CLEVELAND â€“ The Western Michigan football team landed 20 student-athletes on the Academic All-Mid-American Conference Team, as announced by the conference office on Thursday afternoon. The Broncos had the second-most selections in the league. The Academic All-MAC distinction honors student-athletes who demonstrate outstanding dedication to both their academic and athletic pursuits. To qualify, student-athletes must maintain a minimum cumulative GPA of 3.20 and participate in at least 50% of their team's competitions during the season. 2024 Western Michigan Football Academic All-MAC Selections Jacob Gideon, Graduate Student, 3.81, MBA Broc Lowry, RS Freshman, 3.81, Finance Blake Bosma, RS Junior, 3.79, Sales & Business Marketing Boone Bonnema, Graduate Student, 3.75 MBA Hayden Wolff, Graduate Student, 3.75, MBA Tedi Kushi, Graduate Student, 3.70, MBA Addison West, Graduate Student, 3.63, MBA Domanick Moon, RS Sophomore, 3.60, Criminal Justice Chad Schuster, RS Junior, 3.36, Finance Isaiah Green, Senior, 3.33, Sport Management Chris Toudle, Graduate Student, 3.25, Sport Management Jacob Wahlberg, Graduate Student, 3.25, Communication Donald Willis, Graduate Student, 3.25, Graduate Non-Degree Mason Nelson, RS Junior, 3.23, University Studies Joey Pope, Sophomore, 3.20, Business Analytics Jordin Parker, Graduate Student, 3.25, Graduate Non-Degree Print
